bill.title: State and local government.
bill.description: An act to amend Section 41204.1 of the Education Code, to amend Sections 13312, 17561, 29552, 30061, and 30070 of, to amend, repeal, and add Section 19853 of, and to add Sections 17255, 19844.1, 29553, and 99030 to, the Government Code, to add Section 33333.13 to the Health and Safety Code, to amend Sections 13848.2, 13848.4, and 13848.6 of, and to add Section 13812 to, the Penal Code, to add Sections 97.80 and 20623 to the Revenue and Taxation Code, to amend Sections 2104, 2105, 2106, and 2107 of the Streets and Highways Code, to amend Sections 14041.1, 15153, and 18221 of, to add Section 18220.1 to, and to repeal and add Section 18220 of, the Welfare and Institutions Code, and to amend Section 6 of Chapter 213 of the Statutes of 2000, relating to state and local government, making an appropriation therefor, and declaring the urgency thereof, to take effect immediately.

history.action: Referred to Com. on RULES. From committee chair, with author's amendments: Amend, and re-refer to Com. on RULES. Read second time and amended.
Withdrawn from committee. Ordered placed on third reading file. Read third time, passed, and to Senate. (Ayes 48. Noes 0. Page 32.)
In Senate. Read first time. To Com. on RLS. for assignment.
Withdrawn from committee. Ordered placed on second reading file. Read second time. To third reading.

Re-referred to Com. on B. & F.R. From committee: Amend, and do pass as amended. (Page 41.) (February 15). To third reading. Read third time, amended, and returned to third reading. Senate Rule 29.3 suspended. (Ayes 23. Noes 12. Page 42.) Read third time. Urgency clause refused adoption. (Ayes 19. Noes 13. Page 52.) Motion to reconsider made by Senator Florez. Reconsideration granted. (Ayes 3
Died on Senate third reading file.

votes.desc: AB8 EVANS  Assembly Third Reading  Third Extraordinary Session
